tweet.text: PUBLIC PRESENTATION June 6, 2022 at 10am EDT At the #HAC meeting, attend Dr. Seth Rotramel’s presentation on the Carter administration’s policy toward India and Pakistan To register for this free online event, please send an email to FortJL@state.gov (1/4) https://t.co/Az3HucNFM8
